div.p: GRS 1/1880/245, letters received in the Office of the Minister Controlling the Northern Territory, State Records, Adelaide.
To the honorable the Minister of Education, Adelaide.

It is with much pleasure, honored Sir, that I receive through your urbanity the able Report of Mr Holtze.
See M to M. Holtze, 7 May 1880. Let me assure you, that I feel much interested in his experiments; — and as I travelled for nearly a year myself in Arnhem's Land, I can form some idea of the great capabilities of that large extent of country. It will afford me much pleasure, to aid Mr Holtze, so far as it is within my reach to do so, also in future.
